dialogue.introduction: I'm Atago, Admiral, please remember it, okay?
dialogue.library_intro: Second of the Takao-class, Atago! *giggle*. I was born at the Kure Naval Arsenal. Don't I have a balanced and heavily-armed body? At the decisive Battle of Leyte Gulf, I deployed as the flagship of the First Mobile Striking Force... Well, such things happen, you know?
dialogue.secretary3: Oh you, you're just a baby on the inside, aren't you?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral? Well...it looks like Takao's running a bit low on calcium. I wonder if giving her milk to drink will work. Ah...Ouch! Takao!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Ufufufu~ I'm all flustered♪  Ufufu, what is the problem admiral? Eh? Your shoulders are stiff? What a coincidence, mine are stiff too! Oh... you're going to massage me? Haa... that feels good...! Admiral is good. It really feels good! I will let Takao give it a try this time! Ah~ over there...
dialogue.wedding: As a little reward...Admiral and I will exchange "hat", Ufufufu♪  Eh? Is this... for me? Really? Atago, will take it really seriously you know! It's okay? I see... then... please do it onto this finger! Ufufu... it's beautiful...! Admiral, thank you! I will always treasure it.
dialogue.equipment2: Upgrade complete... eh? No I didn't just upgrade these, I've always had them!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'm just going to take a quick break, okay?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: My tanks are so large it makes my shoulders stiff, you know?
dialogue.ship_construction: Oh my, it looks like our friends have increased!
dialogue.night_battle: Night battles.... These are my specialty, no?
dialogue.mvp: Do you understand my ability now? *giggle*
dialogue.sunk: Oh my, what a shame.... is Takao working properly, I wonder...
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas from the Pan paka pa-n~! Here's a present from me! Ah, I'll open it. There. You looked great. Good for you!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: I'm not good with cleaning~. Takao, I'll leave this to you. Ufufu~
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year~! Look forward to Atago, 'kay Admiral! Ufufu, Now, let's go drink New Year's sake!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Hmm... So you eat as many beans are your age, huh? Takao, you know more than you seem. Well, Admiral. How many will you eat? I'll be here to watch.
